mining industry. Bilingual and quick learner with an ability to prioritize simultaneous projects, prospect clients and perform well in
a demanding environment.
Strong communication, presentation, organizational and problem-solving skills.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Sales And Marketing Director - Senior Living

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Our client is a leading provider of premium senior living solutions committed to enhancing the lives of our residents. Our flagship community offers unparalleled amenities, compassionate care, and a vibrant lifestyle for seniors seeking a fulfilling retirement experience.
Position Overview: They are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales & Marketing Director to lead their sales and marketing efforts for their flagship senior living community. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with a proven track record in developing and executing effective sales and marketing strategies to drive occupancy and revenue growth.
Responsibilities:Develop and implement comprehensive sales and marketing plans to achieve occupancy targets and revenue goals.Lead and mentor a high-performing sales and marketing team, providing guidance, support, and ongoing training.Build and maintain strong relationships with prospective residents, their families, and referral sources to drive referrals and generate leads.Utilize market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities for differentiation and market positioning.Collaborate with internal departments to ensure seamless coordination and execution of sales and marketing initiatives.Monitor and analyze key performance metrics to measure the effectiveness of sales and marketing efforts and identify areas for improvement.
Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field; MBA preferred.Minimum of 5 years of experience in senior living sales and marketing, with a proven track record of success.Strong leadership and interpersonal skills with the ability to inspire and motivate a team.Excellent communication and negotiation skills, both written and verbal.Strategic thinker with the ability to analyze market trends and develop innovative solutions.Proficiency in CRM software and other sales and marketing tools.
Benefits:Competitive salary and bonus potentialComprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, and vision insurance401(k) retirement plan with employer matchPaid time off and holidaysOpportunities for professional development and advancement
If you are an experienced Sales & Marketing professional with a proven track record of operating in the sector, please apply now.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
